name: Before Hours Tours: Auschwitz. Not long ago. Not far away.
description:
Gain a deeper understanding of Auschwitz. Not long ago. Not far away. with a private guided tour. Held before the Museum opens to the public, these private tours offer a rare opportunity to explore this monumental exhibition—including over 500 original artifacts—in a quiet and contemplative setting, led by an expert guide.

Visitor Screening Procedure: ROM has introduced bag checks and screening at all Museum entrances. For a smooth and efficient entry, we encourage visitors to bring only essential items.
